name: Black Fog
description:
Made for the MVM 10 Jam.

Souls inspired.

It is far away from being finished but it's in a playable state so don't wait to give it a try.

Controls:

WASD - moving

E - interacting

K - small hit

W + K - small hit over head

L - heavy hit

Space - jumping

LShift - dodge rolling

F - using bandage

R - reading (if there is something to read)
